title: Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam
description: The Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam is a state-of-the-art vehicle camera designed to provide comprehensive protection and security for your journeys. Featuring a 1440p Quad HD resolution, this dash cam captures sharp, high-quality video footage with excellent clarity, ensuring that every detail of your driving experience is recorded. The 140-degree wide-angle lens offers a broad field of view, covering multiple lanes of traffic and capturing a wide swath of the road ahead. The 522GW includes a range of advanced features such as built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, allowing for easy transfer of video footage to your smartphone or tablet. The integrated GPS module tracks your vehicle's location and speed, while the Nextbase app offers a user-friendly interface for reviewing and sharing your footage. The dash cam also features an innovative Emergency SOS function, which automatically alerts emergency services in the event of a serious accident. Other key features include a 3-inch high-resolution touchscreen display for easy navigation and settings adjustments, a magnetic mount for quick and secure installation, and support for up to 128GB microSD cards for extended recording capacity. With its robust build quality and advanced features, the Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam is an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their driving safety and record important events on the road.
key_features: 1440p Quad HD resolution for clear video recording
140-degree wide-angle lens for a broad field of view
Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for easy video transfer and connectivity
Integrated GPS for tracking location and speed
Emergency SOS function for automatic accident alerts
3-inch high-resolution touchscreen display
Magnetic mount for secure and easy installation
Supports up to 128GB microSD cards for extended recording
Advanced driver assistance features including Intelligent Parking Mode
meta_title: Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam - 1440p Quad HD with GPS and Emergency SOS Features
meta_description: The Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam offers 1440p Quad HD video quality, a 140-degree wide-angle lens, built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, GPS tracking, Emergency SOS alerts, and more. Ideal for enhancing driving safety and recording road incidents.

title: Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam
description: The Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam is a premium driving companion that delivers exceptional video recording and safety features for all types of journeys. With its 1440p Quad HD video resolution, the 522GW captures high-definition footage that provides clear and detailed evidence of events on the road. The 140-degree wide-angle lens ensures a comprehensive view of the road, capturing a wide area of your driving environment. This dash cam comes equipped with advanced features including built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, enabling you to easily transfer and share footage via your smartphone or tablet. The integrated GPS function tracks your vehicle’s location, speed, and route, while the Nextbase app offers a convenient platform for managing and reviewing video clips. The 522GW also includes an Emergency SOS feature that automatically notifies emergency services in the event of a serious accident, providing an added layer of safety for drivers. Additional features include a 3-inch high-resolution touchscreen for intuitive navigation, a magnetic mount for effortless installation, and support for up to 128GB microSD cards for extended video storage. With its superior build quality and advanced technology, the Nextbase 522GW is the ideal dash cam for both daily commutes and long road trips.

140-degree wide-angle lens for capturing a wide view
Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for easy file transfer and connectivity
Integrated GPS for tracking location and speed
Emergency SOS function for automatic emergency alerts
3-inch high-resolution touchscreen display for easy use
Magnetic mount for secure and simple installation
Supports up to 128GB microSD cards for ample recording capacity
Intelligent Parking Mode for added security when parked

title: Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam

This high-end dash cam features 1440p Quad HD video resolution, delivering sharp and detailed footage of your driving environment. With a 140-degree wide-angle lens, the 522GW captures a broad view of the road, ensuring that you capture all the important details. The device is equipped with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, enabling you to easily transfer video files to your mobile device and manage your recordings using the Nextbase app. The integrated GPS tracks your vehicle’s location, speed, and route, providing essential information for analyzing driving events. The 522GW also includes an innovative Emergency SOS feature that automatically contacts emergency services in the event of a serious accident, adding an extra layer of safety. Additional features include a 3-inch high-resolution touchscreen display for easy operation, a magnetic mount for quick installation, and support for up to 128GB microSD cards for extensive video storage. Whether you’re commuting daily or embarking on a long journey, the Nextbase 522GW Dash Cam offers exceptional performance and peace of mind for every drive.
